series_description: This series documents appeals to of Notices of Violations that were issued to mine operators, and their resolution. This may include, but is not limited to: copies of the notice, the appeal, and hearing officer decision documentation.
retention_statement: 5 Years after equipment, facility, or property sold or no longer in use

series_description: This series documents the pending status of certification applications when all requirements have not been met. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications for certification, verification of work experience, reports, examinations, grades, Mine Safety and Health Administration (MSHA) 5000-23 form, copies of certifications cards, and correspondence.
This series documents a list of miners and the certifications have where continuing education is required. This series includes but is not limited to: lists and certification documentation.

This series documents the agency's oversight of active and abandoned coal mines. This series may include, but is not limited to:mine licenses, inspection reports, accident records, notices of violation, and supporting documentation.

This series documents coal mine plans submitted by operators to meet specific standards for operating a coal mine including roof control, bleeder, emergency response, fan stoppage, smoker's search, ground control, and blasting and shooting . This series may include, but is not limited to:plans, maps, drawings, and correspondence.
retention_statement: 5 Years after equipment, facility, or property sold or no longer in use

series_description: This series documents filing of maps that verify an operator's request for coal tax credits. This series may include, but is not limited to: maps, notes, reports, and correspondence.
This series documents investigations of fatal coal mine accidents. This series may include but is not limited to: inspector notes, interviews, investigator reports, and final reports.

This series documents the activities of Department personnel engaged in field and other activities including but not limited to locations visited and the reason for the visit. This series may include, but is not limited to:reports
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents maps of coal mines and the mine's history that includes but is not limited to previously mined coal areas and tonnage. This series may include, but is not limited to:surface and underground mine maps, and tonnage reports.

series_title: Mining Requests: Gas Wells and Gas Lines
series_description: This series documents mine operator requests for approval to mine within 150, 200, and 500 feet of active gas wells and gas lines. This series may include, but is not limited to:request letters, plans, mine maps, and certified postal receipt confirmations.
retention_statement: 5 Years after equipment, facility, or property sold or no longer in use

series_description: This series documents the inspection of refuse and impoundment areas that have been reported by the operator. This series may include, but is not limited to: reports, notes, correspondence.

This series documents an agreement between the agency and small mining operations to voluntarily receive training via the Small Mine Safety Services (SMSS). This series may include but is not limited to:contracts and instructional materials.
retention_statement: 5 Years after equipment, facility, or property sold or no longer in use

series_description: This series documents surface-to -coal seam drilling for the safety purpose of removing gas from the mine ventilation system. This series may include, but is not limited to:listing of application permits, maps, plats, and notices of objections to permit.
